dict.string:
[[ ! -d "$HOME"/Rdaemon ]] && echo "Please install Rdaemon first." && exit_show_tool_tip
#get R's PID RPID=$(ps aw | grep '[0-9] /Lib.*TMRdaemon' | awk '{print $1;}' ) echo $RPID #check whether Rdaemon runs - if not start it if [ -z $RPID ]; then if [ -f "$HOME"/Rdaemon/daemon/startScript.sh ]; then "$HOME"/Rdaemon/daemon/startScript.sh fi fi open "$HOME"/Rdaemon/Rsession.tmproj mate "$HOME"/Rdaemon/console.Rcon open "txmt://open?line=1000000&column=10000000"
